British International School Kuala Lumpur Part of The British Schools Group
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
BSKL is pleased to announce a brand new 7 week dance workshop conducted by Sabrina Saw!
Sabrina takes our very popular ASA dance workshop and furthermore the school is partnering Sabrina with Pet Project 2013.
The workshop is open to students in Years 3 up to Year 8. Parents can also get involved too!
More details regarding the workshop and Pet Project 2013 can be found by clicking on the below link:
Swagilicious Saturdays
To register please make the full payment as indicated in the link to the school reception along with the name of your child taking part in the course.
Regards,
Administration Team The British International School of Kuala Lumpur World Class Education
